backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining data types, in‑memory maps, initialization with sample data, and query/mutation APIs for disclaimer text, language‑filtered modules, and chat sessions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high‑level requirements to UI files, components, and test IDs for the SAHAAY MVP.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre‑generated descriptions of all frontend files summarizing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Placeholder stylesheet file with no content provided.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app shell initializing backend and session state, rendering the header, disclaimer, sidebar, and chat screen within a themed layout.
frontend/src/components/sahaay/ChatScree: Chat interface displaying messages, quick‑start tiles, auto‑scroll behavior, and welcome message injection.
frontend/src/components/sahaay/Disclaime: Banner showing the backend disclaimer and emergency number using alert styling.
frontend/src/components/sahaay/Header.ts: Top navigation bar with logo, mobile sidebar trigger, language selector, start‑over button, and About SAHAAY dialog.
frontend/src/components/sahaay/LanguageS: Language dropdown allowing users to switch between English and Hindi.
frontend/src/components/sahaay/MessageBu: Renders user or assistant chat bubbles with avatars, optional safety notes, and placeholder source parsing.
frontend/src/components/sahaay/MessageCo: Handles user message input, session creation, backend syncing, and generating assistant responses based on language modules.
frontend/src/components/sahaay/QuickStar: Displays selectable quick‑start option cards that trigger a context selection based on the user’s language.
frontend/src/components/sahaay/SafetyNot: Renders a safety warning block using localized text from the safety note helper.
frontend/src/components/sahaay/SessionSi: Shows a sidebar listing chat sessions, allows switching and creating sessions, and formats preview text and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/sahaay/SourcesBl: Displays a list of source items with titles, descriptions, and optional external links.
frontend/src/components/sahaay/WhatSahaa: Provides a dialog describing SAHAAY’s capabilities and limitations, populated with API‑fetched info when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context for Internet Identity, handling login, stored identity loading, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and mutate actor-driven data like sessions, messages, and language modules.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/guidance.ts: Formats backend knowledge, processes, and guides into user-facing responses and generates contextual or welcome messages.
frontend/src/lib/persistence.ts: Wraps localStorage operations with safe save, load, and remove helpers.
frontend/src/lib/quickStart.ts: Defines quick‑start options with labels and icons and provides a helper to choose the correct language label.
frontend/src/lib/safety.ts: Detects sensitive contexts and returns language-specific safety notices.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility to merge class names using clsx and tailwind‑merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/state/language.ts: Implements a persisted Zustand store for managing the selected app language.
frontend/src/state/sessions.ts: Implements a persisted Zustand store for local chat sessions with actions to create, update, and manage them.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with theme extensions, color variables, plugins, and dark‑mode settings.
project_state.json: Defines overall project state for SAHAAY, including versioning, architectural notes, required images, and a list of implemented features. Captures core goals around legal-safe citizen guidance, multilingual support, trust/safety, UI elements, and session models.
